item.title: Dan Ziskie, ‘House of Cards’ and ‘Treme’ Actor, Dies at 80
item.description: Dan Ziskie, an actor known for his roles in “House of Cards” and “Treme,” died on July 21. He was 80. His family reported that Ziskie had died from arteriosclerotic cardiovascular disease. Born in Det
